title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Can be cleared
content: You can set the clearable attribute to display the clear icon button in the text box.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Password Display
content: When type is set to password, you can set the show-password attribute to display or hide the password switch button in the text box.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: type attribute
content: You can set the corresponding type through the corresponding type attribute. The default value is text. The options are text, textarea, and other type values of the native input
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Dimension
content: You can set the size through the size attribute. The options are as follows: medium, small, and mini. Note: This parameter is valid only when type!="textarea" is used.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: form
content: You can set the native attribute form through the form attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Native Attribute
content: You can set native attributes such as name disabled readonly .
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Text associated with the text box
content: You can set the label text associated with the text box through the label attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Head icon
content: You can set the header icon of the text box through the prefix-icon attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Fall icon
content: You can set the icon at the end of the text box through the suffix-icon attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Scalable Text Field
content: You can use the resize property to set the zoom of the text field. The value can be none / both / horizontal / vertical . Note: This parameter is valid only when type="textarea" is used.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Lines of the text field
content: You can set the number of lines displayed in the text field through the rows property. Note: This parameter is valid only when text="textarea" is used.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Text Field Width
content: You can set the width of the text field through the cols attribute. Note: This parameter is valid only when text="textarea" is used.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Text field that can adapt to the text height
content: You can use the autosize attribute to set the text field to adapt to the content height. You can transfer an object, for example, {minRows: 2, maxRows: 6} . Note: This parameter is valid only for type="textarea" .
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: tabindex of the text box
content: You can use the tabindex attribute to set the tabindex
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Pre-content
content: Configure prepend slot to set the front content of the text box. Note: This parameter is valid only for type="text" .
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Post Content
content: Configure append slot and set the content after the text box. Note: This parameter is valid only for type="text" .
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Header Content
content: Configure prefix slot to set the text box header content. Note: This parameter is valid only for type="text" .
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Follow Content
content: Configure the suffix slot and set the content at the end of the text box. Note: This parameter is valid only for type="text" .
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Maximum value
content: You can set the maximum value of the text box through the max attribute. max is a native attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Minimum value
content: You can set the minimum value of the text box through the min attribute. min is a native attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Maximum input length
content: You can set the maximum length of the text box through the maxlength attribute. maxlength is a native attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Input word count
content: The show-word-limit attribute can be used to set whether to display the input word statistics, only when type = "text" or type = "textarea" is valid
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Counter
content: You can use the counter attribute to set the character counter for displaying the text box.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Valid interval between digits in the input field
content: You can use the step attribute to set the valid digit interval of the input field. step is a native attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Form validation triggered upon input
content: You can set the validate-event attribute to trigger form validation upon input. Use trigger to configure the mode of triggering the validation rule. If change is used, the validation is triggered when the value in the text box changes. If blur is used, the validation is triggered after the focus is lost.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Obtain focus automatically
content: You can set the autofocus attribute to automatically obtain the focus. autofocus is a native attribute.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Auto Complete
content: The autocomplete attribute can be used to set automatic completion. The default value is off, and the option is on.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Out of Focus Event
content: The blur event is triggered when the text box loses focus.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Value change event
content: The change event is triggered when the value of the text box changes.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Clear Event
content: The clear event is triggered when the clear button in the text box is clicked.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

title: Focus Event
content: The focus event is triggered when the text box obtains the focus.
findIntroStr: Enter characters using the mouse or keyboard.

content: For details, see the following example.

content: For details, see the following example.
